title: Watch Tab RSN Segment
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

+ The user logs into an entitled account with access to RSN content
custom_steps:
WHEN

+ Navigating to the Watch page from the bottom tab options on mobile or top tab options on tablet
custom_expected:
THEN

+ The user will observe the [RSN Title] segment on the Watch page next to the Watch Now segment

AND

+ Tapping on the RSN segment will navigate the user to the expected page with RSN content items

title: RSN Carousels
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

+ The user is observing RSN segment content on the Watch tab
custom_steps:
WHEN

+ Viewing the content sections available under the hero tile
custom_expected:
THEN

+ Content carousels will be available under the content headers

AND

+ The user can successfully launch the video player from the carousel content tiles

Examples:

Highlights
Sound Up
SNY Presents

title: RSN Hero Tile
custom_preconds:
GIVEN 

+ The user is observing the RSN segment

AND

+ The hero content tile is available at the top of the page
custom_steps:
WHEN

+ Viewing the hero tile content

AND

+ Tapping on the hero tile
custom_expected:
THEN

+ A sponsor image may be available on the top left of the tile (EX: Presented By Fanatics Sportsbook on SNY hero)

+ Content title copy metadata is displayed
+ Date and description metadata is displayed
+ Live button is available

AND

+ Content launches successfully and playback is confirmed

title: RSN Video Player Experience
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

+ The user launches LIVE or VOD content from the RSN segment
custom_steps:
WHEN

+ Observing the video player experience
custom_expected:
THEN

Validate:

- Single-play VOD without a playlist player
- MediaGateway Return
- Live Button functionality
- MLB Media Player controls

title: RSN DAI & Ancillary Player Functionality
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

+ The user launches LIVE RSN content from the hero

or 

+ VOD tiles from the content carousels
custom_expected:
THEN

+ Verify the correct returns for:

DAI
- https://dai.google.com/linear/hls/pa/event

Heartbeat (Called every one minute)
- https://playback-heartbeat.mlb.com/?userId=

Conviva
- [number] .ipv4.cws.conviva.com
- [number] .cws.conviva.com/0/wsg

Adobe Analytics
- https://mlb.sc.omtrdc.net/b/ss/mlbios.at.bat.new.implementation

Datadog Logging
- https://browser-intake-us5-datadoghq.com/api/v2/rum?ddsource=ios&ddtags=service:mlb_app_-_ios,version:25.8.0,sdk_version:2.25.0,env:prod,retry_count:1

title: RSN Hero Refresh
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

+ The user is observing the RSN segment on mobile or tablet
custom_steps:
WHEN

+ [Call] returns with new content prioritized for the RSN hero tile
custom_expected:
THEN

+ The page will refresh with the appropriate changes

AND

+ The user can validate the background image and metadata update

AND

+ The updated content launches as expected

title: Watch Tab RSN- unentitled
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the MASN feature flag is turned on
AND I do not have RSN entitlements
custom_steps:
WHEN I have navigated to the Watch tab
OR am already on the Watch tab
custom_expected: THEN I do not see the RSN tab
